Headline: #3 King Drive Temporary Reroute at King Drive/95th
ShortDescription: 3 King Drive buses are temporarily rerouted via King drive, 87th, Cottage Grove, 95th and King Drive, due to street blockage near King Drive/95th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#3 King Drive buses are temporarily rerouted via King drive, 87th, Cottage Grove, 95th, then resume their normal route on King Drive, due to street blockage near King Drive/95th.

Allow extra travel time.
